channel.title: The Gauntlet Podcast - Band of Blades
channel.description:
We interview Stras Acimovic and John LeBoeuf-Little about their Forged in the Dark rpg, *Band of Blades*. They answer questions about themes, BoB's approach to playbooks & roles, playstructure, themes, running online, and designing a game with a limited campaign.
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-gauntlet-podcast/band-of-blades (We momentarily switched up our usual format for this special episode. August was chaotic!)
